channel.title: Items?
channel.description: Is there any way to make a more updated items.cfg like I would like to make my own one or edit one or somthing is this possible? if so how?

item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“mod taharok, post:2, topic:32195”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=46731.msg572631#msg572631 date=1165311693]
i need an item list for all the items so far. im trying to challenge myself and make my own codes without copying codes. so if you can send me a link to all the items, objects, and npcs, i would greatly appreciate it.
[/quote]

Well using the xmls that are included with Moparscape 3, 3.1, and 3.2, you can see most of the items and npcs available to current private servers. If you are trying to rebuild the cfg files, it will not work because it needs that exact order to work with the ItemHandler.java and the cache itself.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

you can open up for item.cgf and then start finding all the bonuses yourself, if you can fill up the entire thing, then people would like…want it :|. If you mean how do you edit it then, the first 3 numbers after the item are the prices. the next 5 numbers are the offensive bonuses. the NEXT 5 are the defensive bonus. The remaining 2 are strength and prayer bonus.

Read full topic
